17352d2e1d592b2f0610db85510f8012 (04:57): Can anyone verify if the Tekram DC-395UW SCSI controller card works with Solaris 10 6/06?  Tekram's site only mentions Solaris support in the FAQ, and only Solaris 7 and 8, though someone's "reported it to work" in the HCL, but I don't trust the entry (it said uses the download of the drivers from the Tekram site, and the Tekram site has no such drivers).
4db8009b479962da53f9f6d42b590a32 (05:21): how can I resize a root partition while online?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:22): DataStream, BZZ..  icorrect
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:23): man growfs
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (05:23): jamesd: What while your in the dir?
a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (05:24): i thought you had to take the partition offline
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:24): growfs will ``write-lock'' (see lockfs(1M)) a  mounted  file
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:24): system when expanding. The length of time the file system is
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:24): write-locked can be shortened by expanding the  file  system
4db8009b479962da53f9f6d42b590a32 (05:25): root is not raid
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:26): use the force^Wmanpage luke

a151f5d5372661fd903498bc13d6098e (05:28): who started that off then
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:31): maybe bill joy
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:31): or some guy at AT&T
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:32): or maybe ESR

53303ac79660a60ff15ef2ae2835996f (05:32): you've only noticed it in the last few weeks, DataStream

7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (05:32): no clue, i do it from time to time...  since i don't usually use it on the command line... i  don't think about it...
